mapper.update:
update base_user
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REALNAME=#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
USERNAME=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
USERADDRESSID=#{useraddressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ROLEID=#{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DEPARTMENTID=#{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DEPARTMENTNAME=#{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SEX=#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MOBILE=#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
BIRTHDAY=#{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
TITLE=#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
USERPASSWORD=#{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
QUESTION=#{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ANSWERQUESTION=#{answerquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
LANG=#{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
THEME=#{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
FIRSTVISIT=#{firstvisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
PREVIOUSVISIT=#{previousvisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
LASTVISIT=#{lastvisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
LOGINCOUNT=#{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
USERONLINE=#{useronline,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
IPADDRESS=#{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MACADDRESS=#{macaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DELETEMARK=#{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MODIFYUSERID=#{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_user set CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REALNAME=#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USERNAME=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USERADDRESSID=#{useraddressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ROLEID=#{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DEPARTMENTID=#{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DEPARTMENTNAME=#{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SEX=#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MOBILE=#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , BIRTHDAY=#{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , TITLE=#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USERPASSWORD=#{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , QUESTION=#{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ANSWERQUESTION=#{answerquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , LANG=#{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , THEME=#{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , FIRSTVISIT=#{firstvisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , PREVIOUSVISIT=#{previousvisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , LASTVISIT=#{lastvisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , LOGINCOUNT=#{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER} , USERONLINE=#{useronline,jdbcType=INTEGER} , IPADDRESS=#{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MACADDRESS=#{macaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DELETEMARK=#{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER} , DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , CREATEUSERID=#{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEUSERREALNAME=#{createuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYUSERID=#{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

DELETE FROM base_user WHERE FUID IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from base_user where #{0} LIKE concat(cancat('%',#{1}),'%')
